scripts.postinstall: if [ -f ../client/package.json ]; then cd ../client && npm install --include=dev && npm run build; elif [ -d ../client/.git ]; then echo "Client appears to be a git submodule â€” initializing submodule and attempting build" && git submodule update --init --recursive ../client && if [ -f ../client/package.json ]; then cd ../client && npm install --include=dev && npm run build; else echo "client package.json missing after submodule init, skipping client build"; fi; else echo "No client package.json found, skipping client build"; fi
